desc: This is a mobile application and it  is designed to share the status of specific location (restaurant, coffee, university, etc.) between one to one user through short conversation. Ex: assume an user staying in his home and he is planning to go to specific restaurant but he does not know if that restaurant is crowded or not. So, he will access this application as offsite user (two kinds of users, onsite user, where the user is inside the location and offsite user, the user who accessing the application outside the location. ), then he will send a message saying what he wants to all users inside that location. Then one of the user inside that location will reply to help offsite user and conversation box will opened between them to get exactly what offsite user wants with limited conversation.The design should include the followingThe design should include the following1. Logo of the application2. each page should be redesigned.2. the design should not be complicated.3. Proof reading for the language.4. Include animation as need, especially for  three introduction page.5. Any sketch, logo , picture should be avoiding the copy past (new design).6. reshaping any field.7. minimize number color.8. Beautiful background, photography, others optimize the use of bold colors, typography, extra-large icons and white space to make an impression with visitors.check the attachment and more details will be discussed later.Thank you
title: Designing landing page mobile application
